post.author: mth
post.body:
is it possible to export md5mesh which is build from many editable meshes, with der_ton's general 3dsmax md5 exporter? i'm trying to group them, but md5mesh files still sees material id only for the first mesh in a row, the rest is exported but without their materials and in-game they are invisible

could somebody help me with this one?

post.author: mth
post.body: nevermind, i'm just idiot
